thread.title: CECILIO P. ANDAYA JR.
thread.title_full: Carid reviewed by CECILIO P. ANDAYA JR.

author: CECILIO P. ANDAYA JR.
title: CECILIO P. ANDAYA JR.
text: this was my first order and have had no problem so far. i got my order in 4 days not damaged whatsoever and packed in a good shipping box.no reason for me call customer service because have no problem with the item i ordered. i wish they will offer free shipping on all products they sell because it's a bit high to be honest.i will still give them 5 star rating and recommend it to others to try them out.
